med pa'i/ /de 'dra'i don gyi rnam pa la/ /rnam par dbye zhing ston par mdzad/ /dper na brag ca stong par ni/ /de don sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen/ /chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med pas/ /theg pa mi mthun gzhan med de/ /sems can rnams ni

bsgral ba'i phyir/ /gsum du rnam par dbye ba mdzad/ /de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom

ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di shin tu dkon zhing / dpag par dka' ba/ thog mar yang dge ba/ bar du yang dge ba/ tha mar yang dge ba/

don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa 'di gang zhig 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa gzo ba lags so/ /de skad

ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu gang mdo sde 'di nyan par byed pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

rigs kyi bu 'dis ni/ sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu smin par byed pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa yin pa dang / mdo sde kun gyi rgyal por gyur pa ste/ de'i phyir mnyan pa dang / gzung ba

dang / bklag pa dang / gdon par bya'o/ /de yang rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'i sems can de dag gis ni dam pa'i chos 'di mnyan par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi

bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa tsam gyis/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag cing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed

pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa dang / sgra la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nyi ma'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang mi

'bral bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par gnon pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/

brjod du med pa'i don bstan pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshig dang spyod pa dang / sgra thams cad la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa bsgrub pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'i

gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu gzungs 'di dag thob pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi

sku mngon par sprul nas chos ston to/ /chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ 'gro ba yang med/ 'ong ba yang med do/ /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / sems can du dmigs pa yang med do/ /chos ston kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba med do/ /

'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba ston kyang 'pho ba yang med/ skye ba yang med do/ /chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ 'du byed rnams gang du yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ gang nas kyang 'ong bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems

dpa' sum stong gis/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa rnams kyis ni/ byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma tshad med pa rnams kyis ni/ chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag

pa thob bo/ /sems can tshad med pa rnams kyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'khor ba'i rgyun gcod dam chos 'di/ /zab

cing phra la blta dka' ste/ /'dod pas bsgribs pa'i dmus long dag /de ma mthong bas sdug bsngal len/ /de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di klog cing 'don pa dang / ston cing gnas pa der bdag cag thams cad mchis nas/ chos ston pa'i 'khor du bgyis te/ de la phan pa dang / bde ba stsal cing lus dang sems bde bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag gis

sems rtse gcig tu gyur pas mchod par bgyi'o/ /nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang bde bas tshim par bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i yul der yang pha rol gyi dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / mu ge'i ya nga bas sdug bsngal ba ma mchis pa dang / skye bo mang pos rgyas shing

yongs su dar bar bgyi'o/ /chos 'di bshad pa'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis mi brdzi zhing gtsang mar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos bshad pa'i gnas

'di ni mchod rten lags pa'i slad du/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / lhab lhub kyis yongs su mchod par bgyi'o/ /bdag cag gis kyang rtag tu bsrung zhing bskyabs te nyams pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis 'khor 'dus pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis mdo sde dam pa 'di bsgrub pa la brtson par gyis shig dang / dam pa'i chos 'di 'jig rten 'dir yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ sa rnam par

sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste drug pa'o// //bam po lnga pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i dbang

po zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa/ pad+mo'i 'byung gnas 'dis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal ba gang dag sngar 'gyur gang byung dang / /phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten dag na gang 'tsho ba/ /rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod/ /thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnam par dag /sku ni gser gyi mdog tu rab tu gda'/ /dbyangs rnams kun pas sangs rgyas gsung snyan te/ /tshangs

pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung / /bung ba rma bya ut+pal sngon po'i dbu/ /mthon mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra/ /kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems/ /rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'/ /spyan ni ring zhing mthon mthing dri ma med/ /

ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra/ /ljags ni che zhing legs pa pad+ma'i mdog /pad+ma 'drar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra/ /zhal gyi mdzod spu pad rtsa dung dang 'dra/ /bai DUr+ya yi mdog 'dra g.yas su 'khyil/ /thub pa'i sku ni zla ba phra 'dra zhing / /zla ba zad 'dra spyan bkrag

bung ba bzhin/ /zhal mtho shangs ni rtag tu lhang nge ste/ /'jam zhing sa yi gser ltar kha dog bzang / /rtag par rgyun du rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /ro mchog 'jam zhing dam pa'i mchog rab 'phags/ /spu yi bu ga nas ni re re skyes/ /spu rnams skyes pa g.yas

su 'khyil pa ste/ /mthon mthing 'dra bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can/ /rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes/ /bltams ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang / /'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi/ /

bde ba kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshim/ /sems dmyal 'gro dang dud 'gror 'gro ba dang / /lha gnas mi yi 'gro rnams su/ /sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshim/ /ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad zhi/ /kha dog bzang ba gser dang

'dra ba'i 'od/ /btso ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku/ /bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med zhal/ /'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri med zhal/ /gzhon nu btsas 'drar sku lus yan lag 'jam/ /seng ge 'dra bar rtsal gyis gnon pa'i mchog /phyag ring phyag ni rab tu

ring ba ste/ /sA la'i lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/ /'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong / /nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhang nge'o/ /thub pa'i dbang po'i sku mchog dri ma med/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lhang

nge bas/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang / /mtshan byad zla ba nyi ma mang po dag /de dag thams cad 'od ni med par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag

brgya dag na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong / /bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku/ /yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku/ /glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i phyag /phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma

med/ /sa yi steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyed/ /phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed byung ba dang / /gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'i/ /ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul

ba dang / /spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dag dang / /dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dge gyur pa/ /snying po mchog rab sna tshogs du ma ste/ /bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis/ /sangs rgyas yon

tan brjod par mi nus so/ /rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan rnams kyang ni/ /lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjod mi nus/ /bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kyi/ /yon tan gcig rgyas brjod par ga la nus/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur te/ /srid

pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba/ /skra yi rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyis/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la min/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rab dang ba yis/ /rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas/ /bdag gis bsod nams 'bras

bu mchog bsags gang / /des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig /de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas/ /rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su yang / /gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na/ /rmi

lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga mthong zhing / /der ni bshags pa 'di 'dra thos par shog /rgyal bstod pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba/ /tshe rabs de dang der ni rnyed gyur cig /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang / /gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka'

ba/ /de dag rmi lam na yang thos par shog /nyin gyur tshe yang de dag ston gyur cig /sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las thar byed shog /pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs bgyis nas/ /phyin chad bla med byang chub thob par shog /bdag gis zhing ni 'gran zla med gyur

cig /rnga phul rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / /rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus/ /shAkya thub dbang mngon du mthong bar shog /der ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cig /gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang gser gyi 'od/ /bdag gi khye'u ni

gang yin 'di gnyis kyang / /der ni bu pho de dag gnyi ga yang / /byang chub bla med lung bstan thob par shog /sems can gang dag gnas med rten med cing / /skyabs dang bral nas phongs par gyur pa dag /de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na/ /skyob dang

dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog /sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig /bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog /sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa/ /ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyod gyur cig /gser 'od dam pa yi ni bshags pa

yis/ /bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho skems par shog /bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig /bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho chad par shog /bdag gi bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig /ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis/ /bdag gi ye shes rgya

mtsho rnam dag shog /yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor 'gyur bar shog /byang chub yon tan yon tan rin chen rdzogs/ /gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /bdag gi bsod nams rab tu snang bar shog /bdag gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag

gyur/ /ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis/ /bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog /bsod nams snang ba lhang nger bya ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur cig /bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog /sdug bsngal rgya

mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang / /bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis/ /ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyod par bgyi/ /'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs/ /de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /yon tan mtha' yas khyad

'phags ci 'dra ba/ /yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag gi zhing / /ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog /mdzes pa'i tog gis shes par byos/ /rgyal po gser gyi lag dbang gis/ /sngon tshe smon lam 'di btab ste/ /de nyid da ltar khyod

yin no/ /sngon gyi dus kyi bu gnyis ni/ /gser gyi lag dang gser gyi 'od/ /de nyid dngul tog dngul 'od ces/ /ngas ni de tshe lung bstan to/ /'khor mang de dag 'di thos nas/ /kun gyis byang chub sems bskyed pa/ /da ltar ma 'ongs dus dag tu/ /

rtag par bshags pa 'di byed shog /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bar gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /

da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du mchod cing bkur sti byed 'dod pas gzungs 'di bcang zhing gzung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs 'di 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir/

gzungs 'di 'dzin pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyis 'dzin cing 'chang bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ma nyams shing skyon med

pa rnams kyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu zab mo 'di la 'jug nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzungs sngags bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ sngar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod cing /

sems rtse gcig pas phyag 'tshol la de nas sngags 'di gdon par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa

thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rnga sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas snang ba dam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spos mchog brtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mnyam par gzigs la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri med 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spobs pas bkod par

dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla 'od rnam dag grags pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog 'od bkod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dge 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i

rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spyan ras gzigs dbang mi 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jigs med grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rab mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag

la phyag 'tshal nas gzungs 'di gdon par bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti ni/ i mi ri to/ ko Sha Ni/ i mi ri Ni/ i rI swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bde bar gnas pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzungs 'di ni dus

gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti

dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bsngags par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de la lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar gnas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'chang ba des gos dang / bsod

snyoms dang / rin po che dang / mang du thos shing mkhas pa dang / nad med cing tshe ring ba la sogs pa yid bzhin du 'thob ste/ bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel lo/ /ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar gnas nas sngags 'di 'chang

zhing 'dzin na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du/ rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi grong khyer ri bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ping ga la chen po la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis srung bar byed do/ /bde bar gnas pas gzungs 'di

sgrub pa'i cho ga ni 'di yin par shes par bya'o/ /thog mar bzlas brjod khri rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas pas bsnyen par bya'o/ /de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du/ dkyil 'khor byas te/ tshes bcu drug gi nyin par khrus byas gos sar pa gyon te/ bdug pa dang / me tog dang / zhal zas

sna mang po la sogs pas/ mchod pa bya zhing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ thog mar sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ gus par phyag 'tshal zhing sdig pa bshags nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la

btsugs te/ sngags de stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas so/ /de nas lus bsrang ste 'dug nas ci 'dod pa de bsam par bya'o/ /de nas nyi ma ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha zas gtsang ma za gcig tu bza'o/ /de nas zhag lnga lon pa dang / gzod dkyil

'khor de nas byung bar byas te/ mi de ni bsod nams dang gzi brjid kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan zhing / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te bsam pa ma grub na yang dkyil 'khor der zhugs na/ bsam pa yongs su

rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ de phyin cad kyang rtag tu rjes su dran par bya'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs te le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs de gsungs nas/ /

gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa stong pa'i mtshan nyid de bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab

mdo rnams gzhan dag tu/ /stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de/ /de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ /stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad par bya/ /sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas/ /chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te/ /de lta bas na

mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ /stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam rab tu bshad/ /sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang / /sems can 'byung bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang / /thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni/ /mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do/ /lus

'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te/ /dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra/ /de dag thams cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi/ /de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so/ /mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug /rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par dpyod/ /sna yi

dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog /lce yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug /lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug /yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par dpyod/ /dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du/ /rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed/ /sems ni sgyu ma lta bur

g.yo ba yin/ /dbang po drug ni yul la rnam dpyod de/ /ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang / /dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin/ /ji ltar bya zhig yul drug gnas bcas shing / /dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa/ /de ltar sems ni yul

'jug gnas bcas te/ /dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang / /ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos/ /sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la/ /dbang por zhugs par bya bzhin g.yo bar gyur/ /dbang po

gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa/ /dbang po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed/ /lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med/ /snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin/ /yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung / /grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas/ /sa dang me

dang chu dang rlung rnams ni/ /grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas/ /dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te/ /rtag tu phan tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin/ /khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang / /gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du

'gro/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te/ /khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang / /'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin/ /me yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang / /'di gnyis

steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin/ /ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis/ /sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong / /lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu/ /ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye/ /bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na/ /

lus ni gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang / /mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur/ /dur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur/ /lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos/ /'di la sems can gang zag gang zhig yod/ /chos rnams 'di dag thams cad

stong pa ste/ /ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/ /'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung min/ /ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste/ /gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi 'byung ba/ /de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do/ /yod pa min zhing nam yang yod min la/ /ma rig

pa yi rkyen las 'byung ba yin/ /ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te/ /de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do/ /'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang / /skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang / /sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang / /skye

dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag /ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang / /tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang / /bdag gi lta bar gyur pa gcad par

bgyis/ /ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo drol/ /phung po'i gnas la stong par gyur par ltos/ /byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis/ /ngas ni bdud rtsi grong khyer sgo yang phye/ /bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan/ /ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas

der 'jug /ngas ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim byas/ /ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs/ /ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus/ /ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas/ /ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab/ /ngas ni nyon mongs dgra tshogs rnams las rgyal/ /

ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng / /srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral/ /ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag /sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs gyur pa/ /rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag /srog chags nyon mongs

mes gdungs zhi byas nas/ /bdud rtsi khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas/ /gang phyir bskal ba du mar sngon chad ngas/ /'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas/ /chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na/ /brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de/ /lag

pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang / /yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang / /nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser/ /bai DUr+ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang / /stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang / /rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang / /nags tshal dag

dang sa las ni/ /'khrungs pa thams cad gcad gtubs te/ /de dag thams cad phyer brlags nas/ /rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par/ /phye ma'i phung po spungs nas ni/ /'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus/ /sa la

rdul ni yod pa rnams/ /stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi/ /rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /sems can kun gyis shes pa gang / /de ni sems can gcig gir gyur/ /shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi/ /phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni/ /sems

can kun las rab 'phags pa/ /ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis/ /thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi/ /rgyal ba'i mkhyen pa mi nus so/ /thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang / /skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang / /bskal pa bye ba du mar ni/ /gang du'ang

bgrang bar mi nus so/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// //de nas lha mo rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa shin tu zab mo de thos nas/ dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes te/ 'khor 'dus

pa de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bstan pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya ba zhu ba'i phyir/ bcom

ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyal ba rkang gnyis gtso lags te/ /'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa/ /byang chub spyod pa yang dag tshul/ /bdag la thugs rjes bshad du gsol/ /rigs kyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod la the tshom ci

yod pa/ /'dri ba'i don de zhus shig dang / /rnam par phye ste bstan par bya/ /de nas yang rigs kyi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das bral

ba'i/ /byang chub spyod pa ji ltar spyad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha mo chos kyi dbyings la gnas te/ byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pas na/ mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bya'o/ /de skad

ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs kyi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos kyi dbyings la gnas te/ byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod cing mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bgyi ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ lha

mo de ni phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su 'dogs te/ chos kyi dbyings ni phung po lnga nyid do/ /phung po lnga yang brjod du med pa/ phung po lnga ma yin pa yang brjod du med pa ste/ de la chos kyi dbyings de nyid phung po lnga yin na ni chad par 'gyur ro/ /gal te phung po

lnga las gzhan par 'dod na ni rtag par 'gyur te/ mtshan ma gnyis dang bral ba/ mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa/ bltar med pa/ blta bar bya ba las 'das pa/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod do/ /rigs kyi lha mo phung po lnga la chos kyi

dbyings su ji ltar gdags zhe na/ phung po lnga de ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa de/ de yang gal te rgyu dang rkyen las skye ba zhig yin na ni/ skyes zin pa skye'am/ mi skye ba skye zhes bya/ gal te skyes zin pa skye na ni/ rgyu dang rkyen kyang mi dgos pa'i rigs so/ /gal te

ma skyes pa skye na ni/ skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ma skyes pa'i chos rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid pas ming med pa mtshan ma med pa/ gzhal ba dang / dpag pa dang / dper bya bas mi brjod pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed par bya ba

ma yin no/ /rigs kyi lha mo dper na/ rnga'i sgra ni shing dang / ko ba dang / lag pa la brten te sgra 'byung mod kyi/ rnga'i sgra de ni 'das pa yang stong / ma 'ongs pa yang stong / da ltar gnas pa yang stong ste/ rnga'i sgra de ni shing las ma byung / ko ba dang lag pa las

kyang ma byung / dus gsum gyis ma bskyed pas mi skye ba ste/ gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gog pa'o/ /gang mi 'gog pa de ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'o/ /gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de ni gang du yang mi 'gro ba'o/ /gang du yang mi 'gro ba de ni rtag pa dang chad pa

ma yin pas gcig pa yang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te gcig pa yin na/ chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad pas/ 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis kyang / don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du gyur pas/ mya ngan

las 'das pa'i bde ba dam pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de lta ma yin pas de gcig pa ma yin no/ /gal te de tha dad pa yin na ni/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang / mtshan ma de nyid 'dzin pa yin pas/ rnam par grol bar

yang mi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang ma bral bas/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa rnams ni 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa yang dag pa'i ngo bor gcig pa'i phyir tha

dad pa ma yin no/ /de bas na phung po lnga po de ni yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa yang ma yin/ rgyu dang rkyen med pas bskyed pa yang ma yin pa/ tshig gis thog tu mi phebs pa/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen med

pa/ dpes bstan du med pa/ thog ma dang tha mar dben pa/ rang gi ngang gis stong pa ste/ de ni 'phags pa rnams kyis mkhyen par bya ba yin gyi/ gzhan gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o/ /de bas na phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su ston to/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi lha mo gang rigs

kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don dam pa dang / kun rdzob gzhan dang gzhan ma yin par 'dod pa de ni dpag par dka' ba ste/ 'phags pa dang / ma rabs kyi spyod yul ni gcig

pa dang / tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te/ kun rdzob kyang ma spangs/ don dam pa dang yang bral bar ma gyur pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /

rigs kyi lha mo de rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ thal mo sbyar bas btud de/ spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol

to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal lo/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'dug pas/ rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces

dris so/ /lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shin tu bsgrub par dka' ba 'di khyod ji ltar spyod pas de la dbang thob par 'gyur/ de nas rigs kyi lha mos tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don

de shin tu zab pas so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de'i don mi shes te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul bas/ mchog tu phra ba shes par dka' ba'o/ /bdag ni chos 'di la brten te/ bde bar gnas pa thob bo/ /gal te tshig de bden pa lta na/ snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams

'di dag na/ tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can du gyur te/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa sha stag tu gyur te/ rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug cing / bde ba

tshad med pa la longs spyod pa dang / lha'i me tog mchog gi char 'bab cing / lha'i sil snyan dang / rol mo ma dkrol bar rang byung ba'i mchod pa de lta bu dang ldan par shog cig ces smras ma thag tu/ snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sems

can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas/ rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug cing / bde ba tshad med pas longs spyod par gyur pa ni/ ji ltar gzhan

'phrul dbang byed lha'i gzhal med khang pa na/ ngan 'gro thams cad med cing rin po che'i ljon shing sna tshogs bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+mas 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang / lha'i me tog gi char 'bab pa/ lha'i rol mo sna

tshogs kyis longs spyod par gnas pa bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro yang bud med kyi lus las/ tshangs pa'i lus su bsgyur cing 'dug go/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro la tshangs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa khyod

ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod/ smras pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po chu'i zla ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/ /rmi lam byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/ /smig rgyu byang chub kyi

spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/ /sgra brnyan byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/ /de skad ces bshad pa tshangs pa chen pos thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa khyod don

gang la gnas te tshig de skad ces smra/ lha mos smras pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chos gang yang bden pa'i mtshan nyid du ma grub cing / rgyu dang rkyen la brten nas grub pa'i phyir ro/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang / bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so/ skyes bu khyod ci'i phyir/ de skad ces smra/ byis pa yang gzhan/ mkhas pa yang gzhan/ byang chub kyang gzhan/ byang chub ma yin pa yang gzhan/ rnam par

grol ba yang gzhan/ rnam par grol ba ma yin pa yang gzhan ma yin mod kyi tshangs pa chen po de dag thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid de so so ma yin pa/ yang dag par dbyer med pa/ bar mtshams med pa/ 'phel ba dang /

'grib pa med pa la mngon par chags shing 'dzin to/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ de'i slob ma sgyu ma sprul pa la mkhas shing byang bar gyur pa zhig gis/ lam gyi bzhi mdor/ sa dang / bye ma dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / lo ma la sogs

pa gnas gcig tu bsdus te/ sgyu ma sprul pa 'di lta ste/ rta dang glang po che'i tshogs dang / dmag dang shing rta la sogs pa'i tshogs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang / bang ba dang mdzod la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun la ston to/ /de la sems can byis

pa blun po mi shes pa'i rang bzhin can dag gis mthong na/ sgyu ma sprul par mi shes te/ rta dang glang po che la sogs pa mthong ba dang / thos pa 'di dag ni yang dag par yod pa yin te/ gzhan ni pa snyam du sems shing / phyis kyang de la zhib tu rtog

par mi byed do/ /de la mkhas pa shes pa'i rang bzhin can rnams ni de lta ma yin te/ sgyu ma sprul pa yin par shes nas/ thos pa dang mthong ba de dag la 'di snyam du sems te/ rta dang glang po che la sogs pa bdag gis mthong ba 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa/

sgyu ma sprul pas 'gro ba'i mig slu bar byed pa ste/ rta dang glang po che dang / bang mdzod la sogs pa 'di dag ni der snang ba tsam du zad de/ bdag gis mthong ba dang thos pa bzhin du bden pa ma yin par yang 'dzin la/ phyis zhib tu brtags na yang pa slu ba'i

chos su shes so/ /de lta bas na thabs mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs te/ ji ltar mthong ba dang thos pa yang kun rdzob tsam du de dag gi don mtshon pa dang tshig gi tha snyad la brten nas/ yang dag

pa'i don shes par bya ba tsam du zad kyi don dam pa ni de lta ma yin no snyam mo/ /yang tshangs pa chen po byis pa so so'i skye bo 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi mig ma thob pa rnams kyis ni/ chos 'di dag thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med par yang mi shes la/

gang mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams ji ltar brtags pa ltar bden pa nyid du mngon par zhen te/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa don dam pa'i tshul de shes par mi nus so/ /de la 'phags pa rnams kyis ni

gang gzigs shing gsan pa dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyis mthu dang / las ji lta bu yin pa de la bden pa'o zhes mngon par mi zhen te/ 'du byed kyi chos kyang mi bden pa/ 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang mi bden pa/ yang dag pa

ma yin pa'i rtog pas brtags pa tsam du 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ming tsam du zad pa/ bden pa'i rang bzhin du mi grub pa ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyis kun rdzob kyi tha snyad la brten nas/ yang dag pa'i bden pa'i don de ston par byed do/ /de

bzhin du tshangs pa chen po gang 'phags pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i gzigs pas chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa bzhin/ 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang de bzhin du lta ste/ kun rdzob tu ming dang mtshan ma sna

tshogs la brten nas/ gzhan la ston par byed do/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro la tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smras so/ /sems can ji snyed cig gis chos zab mo 'di lta bu rtogs shing shes par nus/ smras pa/ tshangs pa chen po gang

sprul pa mang po'i sems dang sems las byung bas chos zab mo 'di yang dag par shes par gyur pa de snyed kyis shes so/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ sprul pa de dag nyid kyang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na/ de dag gis sems dang / sems las byung ba gang

nas skye bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang chos kyi dbyings yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin par yang dag par shes pa de dag gis/ zab mo de'i don shes par nus so/ /de nas tshangs pa chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ chos kyi gzhung zab mo 'di la mkhas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin te/ tshangs pa chen po de ji ltar khyod kyis

smras pa de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'dis khyed la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan du sgrubs shig dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po dang / gzhan yang tshangs pa'i

'khor de dag stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar bas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /

deng skyes bu chen po khyod dang phrad cing bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu thos par gyur pa ngo mtshar che ba lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rin po

che'i 'od dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams

kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /lha'i bu khri phrag brgyad

stong dang / rgyal po dang / blon po la sogs pa/ tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur to/ /de nas 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na/ dge slong khri phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod

pa byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par sems pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ byang chub kyi sems phyir zhing brtan pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas yang

byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ so so nas rang rang gi gos gyon pa phud de/ byang chub sems dpa' la gsol nas/ bla na med pa mchog dam pa'i sems bskyed de smon lam 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa de dag thams cad bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes smon lam btab bo/ /tshangs pa chen po dge slong de dag gis/ bsod nams de la brten nas/ ji skad smras pa bzhin nan tan du bsgrubs nas/ bskal pa chen po dgu bcu 'das pa na/ 'khor ba las

yongs su 'das pa'i shes pa skyes par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ bskal pa'i ming ni rgyal bar dga'

ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ yul gyi ming ni dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar dus gcig tu kun kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de dag kun kyang mtshan smon lam rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yon

tan gyi mtshan bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /gzhan yang tshangs pa chen po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po gang nyan pa dang 'dzin pa de dag ni mthu dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na gang la la zhig

gis/ thabs dang mi ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug /bskal pa chen po brgyad stong du spyod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di glegs bam du bris te/ zla

ba phyed phyed cing sems rtse gcig tu byas te klog cing 'don na/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi phod pa nas/ grangs su bgrang ba dang dper bsgrun par yang mi bzod do/ /tshangs pa chen po de lta bas na/

khyod kyis rtag tu yid la bya zhing / nan tan du bsgrub pa dang / gzung zhing gzhan la yang yang dag par rgya cher bstan par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji ltar skyes bu dpa' bo g.yul ngor

lus dang srog la mi lta ba bzhin du/ ngas kyang mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gzung zhing 'dzin pa dang / klog cing 'don pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa la thogs pa med par gyur to/ /tshangs pa chen po dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po

nam 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar du rin po che sna bdun yang med par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te rgyal po mi bzhugs na/ rin po che sna bdun yang mod la med par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa chen po de ltar de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jig rten

na gnas kyi bar du/ bla na med pa'i chos rin po che thams cad kyang nub par mi 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di nam med pa na gzhan dag kyang nub par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems rtse gcig tu byas te/ mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang /

klog pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher bshad pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / lus dang srog la mi blta bas ngal ba dang / dub pa khyad du gsod cing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/ bsod nams kyi nang na mchog yin par nga'i 'khor rnams

kyis kyang de bzhin du bslab cing nan tan du bya'o/ /de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la sogs te/ tshangs pa'i 'khor grangs med pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la sogs pa de dag thams

cad stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang

po'i rgyal po 'di bsrung ba dang yongs su rgyas par bgyi'o/ /chos 'di ston pa'i tshe bgegs dang bar chad kun bsal te/ dge bar 'gyur ba dang / kha dog dang / mthu yongs su rdzogs pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ba dang /

de'i 'khor rnams kyang bde ba nyams su myong ba dang / gang na gnas pa'i yul 'khor de yang mu ge dang dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ma yin pas 'tshe ba zhig mchis na yang bdag cag lha'i 'khor gyis yongs su bsrungs pas/ de dag bde zhing skyid pa dang / gnod

pa rnams ma byung bar gyur na/ de dag kyang bdag cag lha'i mthu lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di la mchod cing rim gro bgyid na/ de la bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mchod cing rim gro bgyi'o/ /de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po la sogs te/ tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la sogs pa rnams la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis

dam pa'i chos zab mo 'di yang thos/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dang 'di 'dzin pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa'i sems bskyed pa des bsod nams kyi khyad par tshad med pa dang ldan pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

rgya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las stong pa nyid la brten nas

bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla

gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo

sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/

lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te/ brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim

thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi

rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zlog pa/ mu ge'i ya nga ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi ya nga ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza'i gnod pa thams cad sel ba/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon

mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa 'bum rab tu 'joms par bgyid lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya

cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ chos mnyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi'i lha'i lus 'di gzi byin chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs

dang mthu yang bskyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang bdag cag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal po lags te/

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o/ /'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa/ snying rje ma mchis pa/

gzhan gyi gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin 'bum 'phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun du lha'i mig rnam par

dag pa/ mi'i las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ 'jig rten skyong zhes ming du chags so/ /btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i ya nga ba'am/ nad kyi ya nga ba'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa 'bum dag gis gtses par 'gyur ba

na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po

bzhis/ rdzu 'phrul dang / byin gyis rlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag bskul ba na/ yul gang dang gang du mchis par gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ gang dag gnod

pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sna tshogs stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu/ gser 'od

dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te thos nas/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las

kun tu srung bar bgyid/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar

bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma

mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang

yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa la/ bsti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing

mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po chen po de la/ rgyal po thams cad pas ches bsti stang du bgyi/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim gror bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thams cad du yang rab tu

bsngags par bgyi'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhis lha dang mi la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //bam po drug pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs

so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so/ /rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs so legs so/ /'di lta ste/ khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag

mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ khyod ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems

dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis mi'i rgyal

po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar

gyis shig /des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / bcas pa khyed bzhis/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun

tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang / yongs su gzung bar yang 'gyur ro/ /des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis/ lha dang / lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur

ro/ /lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po

'dzin pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung

dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du spyod

par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang la la zhig /lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing / rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa

mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ gang dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang du bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gro

bgyid cing mchod de rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i chus/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di

dag gzi byin chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang mthu stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag

cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na

gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /

yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar

bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su

thar bar bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye

ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug

pa mi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang / nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin na/ gnod pa sna

tshogs brgya dang / brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo / /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du/ rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs

yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig par 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang

g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ der mchi bar bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul du zhugs pa las kyang / de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o/ /brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub

par bgyi'o/ /bgegs kyang bgyi'o/ /'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchir yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid par lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/

rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so/ /rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs so/ /khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po

gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang /

bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa

spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyis shig /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog par gyis shig /'dzam bu'i gling

thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po de dag mi 'thab pa dang / mtshang mi 'dru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig /rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi

stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi skyed pa dang / rang gis

ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyis mi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong

khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab/ mtshang mi 'dru/ mi rtsod mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na

dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang byin can du 'gyur/

dus dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo khyud kor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/

'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang / nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang / ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher

bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang / lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur te/

rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing rgyal po chen po khyod bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas

par gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu klung / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro/ /khyed kyi lha'i lus

'di dag gi gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel lo/ /khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu stobs kyang skyed do/ /khyed kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po de 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la

yang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /des na mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung

ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po

byas par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi brjid dang

ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur/ gnod

pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam

thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa

mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la yang /

bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de thams cad la yang zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa/ bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la bdag

gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yang yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag gi yul

thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis

par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa'i sems dang / rim gro dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ bsti stang du bgyis te

mnyan par bgyi'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des/ rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o/ /der mchis nas kyang / rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag

chag gdab cing / me tog sil ma sna tshogs dgram par bgyi'o/ /spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o/ /phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba

dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o/ /gos dri rab tu bda' ba/ gos sar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o/ /bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding

bar bgyi ste/ stan de la mchis nas/ rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o/ /der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o/ /rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis/ gser 'od dam

pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/ /dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i

'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang / phan pas blta bar bgyi'o/ /btsun mo dam pa rnams dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o/ /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang tshig snyan pa smra bar

bgyi'o/ /chos mnyan pa'i phyir mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor du stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas/ bdag tshim par bgyi'o/ /dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o/ /dbang po bde

bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o/ /bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o/ /rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/ chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o/ /spud pa dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bya'o/ /gdugs

dkar po yang gzung bar bya'o/ /rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la chos smra ba de bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji

snyed bor ba/ de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 'thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po

bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba/ lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag 'thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyis rgyal rigs dang / lha'i rgya che zhing rgya che ba 'bum

phrag du ma 'thob par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya

che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs

bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag

tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu dag mthong nas/ mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba la bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston

par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o/ /

deng bdag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o/ /deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon

pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug

bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum

phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis

bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis btsun

mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis yul

'di dag thams cad kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyangs pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed

par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa/ de dag la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bus bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror

byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag la shas kyis dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de

dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi brjid kyis kyang

brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun par shin tu tshar chod par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan

'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de lta bus/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag la yang

bsti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du/ rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po

chen po bzhi dang / lhan cig tu thun mong du chos mnyan pa de nyan cing bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad cig sbyin par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po des

bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du/ bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnams las/

spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/ rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas

par 'gyur ro/ /spos kyi dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri

shing dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi

sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po

chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar

'gyur zhing / snang ba des gnas thams cad snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar

snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag /mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag

tu lag na pog snod cig thogs pa de las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad na gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag

brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug dang / 'khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang

sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na/ lha dang / klu dang /

gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyi rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri

rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/

lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po des/ spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma

thag tu/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma/ gang gA'i klung gi

bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ de dag

kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi

bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur te/

skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bu zab mo'i don 'di lta bu zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu

'chad par 'dod pa khyod yang legs so legs so/ /zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang

ba dang / 'chad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'

bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas phyogs bcu kun du sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba

khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshig mthun pa dang / ngag mthun pa dang / sgra skad mthun pas dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi khri stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa

khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa sems can thams cad las rab tu

'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs skyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying por legs par brgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu

dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/

mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med par rab tu zhi ba rdul dang bral ba zab mo mngon par

rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa

khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa brdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na med pa 'bar ba byed par 'gyur/

skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'bum phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/ 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya

mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag /'khor ba'i 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /

de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i yon tan tshe 'di dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung
