ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa mthong nas/ snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang

g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag /spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu/ lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma mchis

pa/ legs par phyag dar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchis par bgyi'o/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang

po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde

dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i

pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri stan mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par 'gyur ba ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das

bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma de dag thams cad mthun par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba thob par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos bdud

rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po de la kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang /

yul de yang kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o/ /yul der yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang /

'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po de/ dge slong

ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /

gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la chos mnyan pa 'di dang chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid do/ /bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang stobs

kyang mi skyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig

'bum phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang / yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa

bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul gang na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang / mtshang

'dru ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dang 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/

dgung zla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang / nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa yang rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/

sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin pa grag par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char pa drag po 'bab par 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i ya nga ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/

yul de phung bar 'gyur sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang yul na gnas

pa'i lha dang klu rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de bdag nyid la kun du bsrung ba chen po

bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar gyur/ bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag

tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul thams cad du yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las

yongs su thar bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang

po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod pa bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/

bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa

bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa

lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum phrag de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin

gshegs pas/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lags so/ /ci nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas rang

gi yul kun du bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad na gnod pa dang / dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste/ phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul de dag

na nad 'go ba ma mchis shing / 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing / mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas mi'i rgyal po de dag gis/ rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing /

snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas

pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang stobs dang / mthu chen po skyed par 'gyur ba dang / ci

nas bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du lo legs shing nyams dga' la/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas

pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/ da lta na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag gi lha'i shes pa bas/ ches 'phags pa de

bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad bas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /mi'i rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba

gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i

dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nye bar bstan/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen des mi'i rgyal po des/ gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gror

bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o// /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas/ gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser

'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba rgya cher gyis shig /rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa

de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug cig dang / de dag lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/

rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma bsrung ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde bar 'gyur zhing / gser 'od dam

pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun du bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs

su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis pa 'di/ sems can gang la

la dag 'dzin cing 'chang bar mos pa de la/ bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu de la bdag gis bsrung zhing bskyabs pas/ de'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsal te/ bde bar gnas par bgyi'o/ /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang

bskyed par bgyi'o/ /gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin par 'dod pas lus bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di sngar brjod par bya'o/ /na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ra ra ra ra/ ku no ku no/ khu no khu no/ ru no ru no/ sa ba sa ba/ ka ra ka ra/ ma hA bi

ka raM/ ma hA bi ka raM/ ma hA kA la/ ma hA rA dza/ rak+Sha rak+Sha tu mAM/ sarba satwA nAny+tsa swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di skud pa dkar po la sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa lan re bor te/ de ltar lan bdun byas nas/ dpung pa la btags na don de nges par

'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te/ spos gu gul dang / tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / du ru ska dang / a ga ru dang / spos dkar po la sogs pa 'di dag cha mnyam par sbyar ba'i spos kyis mchod cing / sngags 'di

bzlas pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang bar bya'o/ /na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ ma hA d+ha na dA ya/ tsaN+De shwa rA ya/ A kar+Sha/ a pa ra dzi ta/ tsaN+De shwa ra/ pa ra ma/ kA ru Ni ka /sarba satwA/ hi ta tsin+tA/ ma ma d+ha na bar d+ho/ par+ye shwa ra swa yam/ A kar+Sha ya swA hA/

sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas pa'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /sngags 'di 'don pa'i dus su dkon mchog gsum dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la sngar phyag 'tshal bar bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa

skong zhing nor sbyin pas sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas na/ sems can de dag yid bzhin du bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes

bya ba'i sngags kyi snying po 'di smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si mi si mi/ su mu su mu/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki li ki li/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ san+d+hu ya/ At+ma nAM/

ni ta t+ya na/ an+tar+d+hA tu swA hA/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/ d+ha na dA ya swA hA/ ma no ra tha pa ri pU ra ya swA hA/ sngags 'di sngar lan stong bzlas pa'i 'og tu khang pa dben pa'i nang du lci bas dkyil 'khor chung ngu zhig byas te bshos ci 'byor pas mchod par

bya'o/ /spos dam pa bsregs pa'i du ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing nyin mtshan du sems rtse gcig pas sngags kyi snying po 'di bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa byas na/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i sras dzi nar sha b+ha zhes bya ba gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis

de'i gan du mchis te nga'i yab la ci zhig gsol zhes dri bar byed do/ /de nas des bdag ni dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ nor zhig gsol gyis stsol cig ces smros shig /de nas sras dzi nar sha b+has yab la gsol ba/ skyes bu dam pa zhig dkon

mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ nor zhig gsol lo zhes gsol pa dang / yab kyis khyod myur du song la nyin gcig bzhin du kA pa Na brgya brgya byin cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas sngags sgrub pa des ltas de lta bu mthong nas/ don de grub par shes te/

gnas dben par bdag gcig pu spos bsregs la nyal khar sngas su dri'i za ma tog gcig bzhag ste nyal bar bya'o/ /de phyin chad nang gcig bzhin du za ma tog de'i nang nas nor ci 'byung ba las nor de de'i nyin par dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yo byad me tog

dang / spos dang / zhal zas la sogs par sbyar ba dang / brel cing phongs pa rnams la yang sbyin zhing zad par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams par bsam mo/ /khro ba dang 'tshe ba'i bsam pa bskyed na/ de nyams par 'gyur bas/ khro ba'i

sems mi skye bar rtag tu bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzin pa des nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gzhan yang sras dang / sras mo'i 'khor du bcas pa la/ rtag par bsam zhing / bstod pa dang / bsngags pa

bya'o/ /rtag par dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis gtong zhing lha la sogs pa rnams kyi mthu dang bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba rgyas pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha de dag gis de ltar byed pa

de mthong nas kun dga' zhing mgu rangs pas 'ong zhing de la bsrung ba dang / skyob par byed do/ /sngags mkhan de nyid kyang tshe lo dpag tu med par gnas shing / ngan song gsum yongs su spong ba dang bgegs dang / bar chad thams cad kyang med par

'gyur ro/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di dang / gter gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul la dbang sgyur zhing bsam pa thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro/ /gal te longs spyod can du 'dod na yang yid bzhin du grub pa dang / bya dang

gcan gzan gyi skad thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das sngags sgrub pa des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na/ tshes brgyad dam/ tshes lnga'i nyin par ras dkar po la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka pi ta dang sbyar ba'i tshon rtsis

rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogs su ni dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs su ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bdag bu smad dang 'khor du

bcas pa bris te/ gnas der bkram nas/ me tog sna tshogs dang / dri sna mang po dang / mar me dam pa dang / zhal zas bda' ba sna tshogs kyis/ nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par mchod par bya'o/ /sngags 'di zlos pas sems mi g.yeng bar bya zhing /

rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o/ /na maHshrI kaN ThA ya/ bud d+hA ya/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ yak+Sha rA dzA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ a ti rA dzA ya/ na maHshrI/ ma hA de byai/ tad+ya thA/ ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba ra ba ra/ su

shud+d+ho su shud+d+ho/ ha na ha na/ ma Ni ka na ka /badzra bai DUr+ya/ muka ti ka /a laM kr-i krI ta sha rI rA ya/ sarba satwA/ hi ta kA ma/ bai shra ba Na shrI ya de bI pra b+hA ya/ e hi e hi/ mA bi lam+ba/ g+hUr+Na g+hUr+Na/ pa ra s+ya pa ra s+ya/ da dA hi ma mA/

dar+sha na kA ma s+ya/ dar+sha na~M/ ma ma ma na/ pra la ha dA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngags zlos pa de dang / mchod pa rgya chen po mthong nas/ bdag byams pa dang / dga' ba'i bsam pa skyes nas/ bdag de'i mdun du byis pa gzhon nu'i

gzugs sam/ yang na rgan po'am/ dge slong gi gzugs su byas te/ bdag lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu gser gyi snod dang bcas pa thogs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ lus kyis gus pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu

brjod de/ sngags mkhan de la 'di skad ces smra'o/ /khyod ci dang ci slong ba de dag thams cad grub par byas te/ nags tshal dben par 'gro 'dod pa'am/ nor bu rin po che 'dod pa'am/ mi mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'dod pa'am/ gser dang / dngul

la sogs pa'i nor 'dod pa'am/ sngags gzhan sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / sman bcud kyis len 'dod pa la sogs pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin du grub par bya'o/ /bdag

gis dngos po de dag la sogs pa mdo tsam zhig smos par zad kyi/ de ma yin pa gzhan zhig 'dod na yang thams cad bsam pa bzhin du yongs su grub par bya ste/ rin po che'i gter mi zad pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /

dper na nyi zla 'di sa la lhung bar 'gyur ba dang / sa chen po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dus ni yod kyang srid kyi/ bden pa'i tshig 'di ni nam yang slu bar mi 'gyur bas rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bzhin du skyid pa dang longs spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan

yang bcom ldan 'das mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gang zhig 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing 'don pa yang rung / sngags 'di sgrub pa yang rung ste/ tshegs chung ngus myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dbul zhing phongs

pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du sngags 'di bshad pas/ de phyug cing bde ba'i mchog dang phun sum tshogs pa tshe gcig tu 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis kyang de yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir/ rjes su 'brang zhing gnod pa

dang / 'tshe ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de 'dzin cing rgyas par byed pa dang / sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag de gom pa brgya tshun chad 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin stong

rnams kyis kyang rtag tu de'i g.yog tu bsko zhing mngag gzhug yid bzhin du byed du gzhug go/ /bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di slu ba med par yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus sngags de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom

ldan 'das kyis legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad sred pas gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad bral bas phyug cing bde bar bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras pa dang / gzhan yang mdo sde 'di 'jig rten du

yongs su rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di bshad pa ni legs so legs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ zhabs

gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku/ /rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od/ /rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan/ /rgyal ba

me tog pad rtsa rdul med tshems/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ /rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang / /ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun du gang / /rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor los bris 'dra

ste/ /khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong / /phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste/ /zhabs kyi dra ba ngang pa'i dbang po bzhin/ /gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gda'/ /rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang rgyal/ /yon tan thams cad ri dbang 'dra ba ste/ /

sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba chu zla 'dra/ /nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur chags med pa/ /rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po

chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu dag gis gser 'od dam pa yi/ /mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di/ /'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni/ /brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya/ /'di ltar

mdo sde dkon mchog zab mo 'di/ /sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa/ /sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi/ /'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal

dang / /sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi ni/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin/ /'dzam gling 'di na 'dzam gling gnas pa yi/ /rgyal po gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis/ /rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni/ /chos rnams kyis ni

yul dag bskyang bar gyis/ /gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang / /shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dgar 'gyur zhing / /'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang / /sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis/ /'di na mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni/ /

yul la dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang / /rgyal srid rnam par 'byor pa dga' ba des/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya/ /mdo sde'i dbang 'di mchog tu dge bar byed/ /pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad par byed/ /pha rol dmag tshogs zlog byed dge ba

byed/ /mchog tu 'jigs pas phongs pa sel bar byed/ /dper na rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa/ /yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar/ /rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang / /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta/ /dper na

chu grang skom pa sel byed pa/ /tsha bas nyam thag de ni rnyed pa ltar/ /yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la/ /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/ /dper na rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar/ /

mi yi dbang po tshogs la gser 'od mchog /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/ /'di ni lha yi tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa/ /mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pas/ /'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa/ /bzhi po dag gis kun du bsrungs pa

yin/ /phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin/ /gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis/ /phyogs bcu

dag tu yul yang srung bar byed/ /rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed/ /'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi/ /lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas/ /

mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed/ /chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni/ /gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob/ /gzi byin chen po yis ni lha yi lus/ /shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das

la tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig tu ngus nas mchi ma phyis te/ de dag lus 'phar yan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / bde

ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor to/ /mngon par gtor nas kyang stan rnams las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/

pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal po chen po re re la yang gnod sbyin lnga

brgya lnga brgya dang / chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du/ rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /gal te mdo sde 'di las tshig gi don 'ga' zhig brjed par gyur na yang / bdag cag gis de la dran pa dang / mi brjed

pa'i mchog gi gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dag gang na bzhugs pa'i gnas de dag gi sems can rnams kyis yongs su rgyas par byed pas/ nam yang nub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor

'dus pa de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag gis ye shes dang / spobs pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa thob pas/ nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/ bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shing 'khor ba

yongs su spangs te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las rgyal po chen po bzhis yul 'khor yongs su skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// //

bam po bdun pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bsgoms

pa rnams kyi ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gi don de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad

ces bka' stsal to/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod gzungs ni yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas shing / chos kyang ma yin/

chos ma yin pa yang ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin/ dngos po can yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa can yang ma yin/ rkyen las byung ba yang ma yin/ rkyen med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/ 'gro ba las byung

ba yang ma yin/ 'gro ba med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/ chos gang gi skye ba yang ma yin/ 'gog pa yang ma yin par chos ston mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims

dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs sgrub pa'i lam gyi rig pa dang / stobs kyi gnas ston pa legs so legs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal

pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gzungs thob pas gang la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi

ldog par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par dam bcas par 'gyur ba dang / rten med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi spobs pa can gyi slob dpon dang / lam la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa

bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas

nyid du brjod par bya ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la la gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la bkur stir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa des sangs rgyas la bkur stir byas par 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la

la gzungs 'di nyan par byed pa dang / gang dag gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa dang / gang dag mos par byed pa de rnams la byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas/ sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs de ni 'di yin te

tad+ya thA/ san d+hA ra Ni/ uta d+hA ra Ni/ su saM pra tiSh+Thi te/ su nA ma/ su pra tiSh+Thi te/ bi dza ya ba la/ sat+t+ya pra ti dz+nyA/ su A ro ha/ dz+nyA na pra ti/ ut+pA da ni/ a ba nA ba ni/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni/ a b+hi bya hA ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ su niHshri ta/ ba hu guM b+ha/ a b+hi ba dA swA hA/

sha ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang gis shin tu gnas pa dang / legs par gzung ba byas nas/ 'chang bar byed pa de bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya phrag stong

du yang smon lam zad par mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ dug gis ma yin zhing sbrul gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i gzungs 'di ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas

rnams kyi yum/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig

rten gyi khams grangs med pa phrag bcu rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yon du phul zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams la bskal pa grangs med par na bza' dang / zhal zas gya nom pas bzhugs par byed pa bas/

gang dag gis chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig gcig tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can de dag de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi

rnam grangs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum yin no/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'

stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis glog thams cad zlog pa/ so sor 'brang ba sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ nga yang da ltar 'chad kyis zung shig /kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo lho

phyogs na skad brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod de/ kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang / phyogs rnam par gnas

pa shes pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/ gnas gang du bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu/ glog thams cad mi 'bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/

drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni mi/ ni min d+ha ri/ 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi

tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ka Te bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ pra t+ya r+thi ke /prat+ya mi tre/ shud+d+he/ muk+te/ bi ma le/ pra b+hA swa re/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ shwe te/ paN+Da ra bA si ni/ ha ri kaN+Da ri/ ka pi li/ piM ga la/ ak+Shi da d+hi mu khi/ dus ma yin

par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis/ bdag dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu ni na d+ha ri mu ni/

ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ hA hA hA hA/ khyod la sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyis drA bi Da swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsrung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris pa de bdag gis rtag

par rgyun du/ 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar bar bgyi'o/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

bdag gis kyang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li swA hA/ brah+ma pU re swA hA/

brah+ma swa re swA hA/ brah+ma b+hi su gar+b+he/ puSh+pa saM sta re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi bsrung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/ /

de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams

brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ni ba rA Ni/ ban+d+ha mA ran+te ma ti ti/ ti ti/ gau rI/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+DA li/ mA tang+gi/ pa r+Na le/ hi na ma d+h+ya ma d+ha ri Ni ma la ni/ da la mad de/ tsakra bA krI/ sha ba ri/ sha ba ri swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das

'di ni bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar bgyid pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po

dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo

mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe su puSh+pe/ d+hu ma pa ri hA re/ Ar+ya pu sha ste/ shAn ti/ nirmuka te/

mang+ga l+ya/ hi ra N+ya gad+d+he stu te/ sta bi te swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag gi bsrung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tshe skyong ba dus ma lags

par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de

logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi srung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/ glog thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/ dug

rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang / byad stems dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs

te bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni ser sna can te sems ser snas bskor ba lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ Ar+ya dze a ma re a mr-i te/ ak+Sha ye/ a b+hi ye/ puN+yai/ bar+ya ba te/ sarba pA pa~M/ pra sha mA ni ye swA hA/ Ar+ya puN+ya

so pA kI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag skyes pa'am/ bud med gang la la'i lce la 'don pa'am/ yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i

dug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i dbang po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bzhin dag khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/

drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa legs so legs so/ /phyogs rnams ni gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang /

brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / klu'i dbang po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gser 'od dam

pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slad du/ spobs pa nye bar bsgrub

par bgyi/ gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gis brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi/ dge slong chos smra ba de la shes pa'i snang ba chen po bgyi/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig 'ga'am/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dag

gcig /yongs su nyams par gyur tam/ bskyud na bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang / yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /ci nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun

pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/

shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu

ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la rab tu mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bskyud pa ma mchis

par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/ sngags dang / sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang /

'chi ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug glong dang / khrag khrug dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du

stsal ba'i sman dang sngags ni 'di dag ste/ shu dag gi'u wang spr-i ka dang / /sha mya sha shI ri shA/ /in+d+ra hasta skal ba che/ /dz+ha ma shing tsha a ga ru/ /shi ri bi sta sra rtsi pog /gu gul ra sa sha la ki/ /rdo dreg lo ma rgya spos dang / /tsan+dan dang ni ldong ros dang / /

gi'u wang bcas dang ru rta dang / /gur gum gla sgang yungs kar dang / /dbyi mo sug smel na la dang / /nA ga ge sar u shi ra/ /'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas/ /skar ma rgyal la btag par bgyi/ /phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di/ /lan brgya mngon par

gdab par bgyi/ /tad+ya thA/ su te kr-i te/ ka ma ta li/ na le dza na ka ra te/ hang+ka ra te/ in+d+ra dza li ni/ shaM ka ra dri pa shad dri/ a brta ka /se ke na ku tra ku/ /ka bi la/ ka bi la ma ti/ shI la ma ti/ shI la ma ti/ san+d+hi/ d+hu d+hu ma ba ti/

shi ri shi ri/ sad t+ya s+thi ti swA hA/ lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni/ /me tog sil ma dgram par bgyi/ /gser gyi snod dang dngul snod du/ /mngar ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi/ /skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni/ /bzhi zhig der yang gzhag par bgyi/ /

rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi/ /bum pa thogs pa gzhag par bgyi/ /rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi/ /sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal/ /gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan gyis/ /lha mo de ni legs par brgyan/ /bar bar dag tu me long bzhag /

mda' dang mdung rtse sne sprad bzhag /de nas mtshams kyang gcad par bgyi/ /de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam/ /sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis/ /mtshams gcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi/ /sAd+ya thed na/ a ka ra ke/ na ya ne/ hi le mi le/ gi le/ khi

khi le swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sna ma logs su khrus bgyis nas/ sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na khrus kyis zhi bar sbyar ro/ /tad+ya thA/ sa ga De/ bi ga De/ bi ga ta ba ti swA hA/ phyogs bzhi dag na gang gnas pa'i/ /rgyu skar dag gis tshe

srungs shig /btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / /phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang / /'byung po'i khams rnams 'khrugs bgyid pa/ /'jigs pa mi bzad zhi gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ sa me bi sha me swA hA/ sa ga De/ bi ga De swA hA/ bi ga De ba te

swA hA/ sA ga ra sa~M b+hu tA ya swA hA/ skan+d+ha mA tA ya swA hA/ nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/ a pa ra dzi ta/ bir+ya ya swA hA/ hI ma ban+d+ha sa~M b+hu tA ya swA hA/ i ni bi la bag trA ya swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+mA Ne/ na ma swa ra swa t+yai/ ma hA de bai sin tu mAM/ man+t+ra

pa dA/ ta ra tu bi tsi ta~M/ bra h+mA nu ma n+ya tu swA hA/ dge slong chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag gi don gyi slad du/ khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchis par bgyi'o/ /lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu grong

ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /ci nas dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang /

'khor ba las 'byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /

gza' dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang / ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo

dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhus te/ khyod kyi sngags dang / sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo chen mo

dbyangs can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kau N+Di n+yas lha mo dbyangs can de bkug go /lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che/ /'jig rten kun du

rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon tan che/ /rtser gnas mdzes ma dUr ba rtswa yis gos bskus pa/ /dUr ba'i rtswa yi gos gyon rkang pa gcig gi gnas/ /lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad tshig smras te/ /sems can rnams la dge ba'i tshig shod

lce khrol mdzod/ /sAd+ya the dan/ mu re/ tsi re/ a ba dze/ a ba dza ba ti/ hing+gu le/ mid+gu le/ ping+ga la ba te/ mung+ga She/ ma ma rI ts+yai/ swa ma ti/ da sha ma ti/ a g+h+ri ta ma g+h+ri/ ta ra tsi/ ta ra tsa ba ti/ tsi tsi tsi ri/ shi ri mi ri/ ma ri ts+yai/

prA na pri ye/ lo ka dz+yeSh+The/ lo ka shreSh+The/ lo ka pre ya/ sid+d+ha pra te/ b+hI ma mu khi/ shu tsi tsa ri/ a pra ti ha te/ a pra ti ha ta bud+d+hi/ na mu tsi/ ma hA na mu tsi/ ma hA de byi/ pra ti grI hA/ na ma ska rA na/ bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig /bstan bcos

dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyud dang / sde snod dang / snyan dngags la sogs pa la/ bdag gi rig sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+hA be/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus bdag rnam

par rgyal bar gyur cig /kA ra te/ ke yU re/ ke yU ra ma te/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lha'i bden pas lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o/ /

gang dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dgug par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo chen mo dbyangs can

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ de nas lha mo dbyangs can gyi gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag smras nas/ yang bram ze kau N+Di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu chen po khyod sems can thams cad la spobs pa

dam pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / shes rab che ba dang / nor dang / dbyig la sogs pa sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing / myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa legs so legs so/ /mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i cho ga

bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gzungs 'di dang por su 'don pas/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal te/ /'khrul pa med par bzlas byas na/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang dam chos

dang / /byang chub rang rgyal nyan thos dang / /tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang / /rgyal chen bzhi la phyag 'tshal zhing / /rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa yang / /rim gro gus par bsam byas te/ /zhi la dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /sgra bskyed gzungs dang bstod pa brjod/ /

ji snyed sangs rgyas lha klu la/ /mchod pa rgya cher bsham par bya/ /skye bo'i rigs ni mang po la/ /snying rje'i sems kyang bskyed par bya/ /bcom ldan gser mdog mtshan rab can/ /rtse gcig sems kyis bsam bya zhing / /bcom ldan

gsung rab dam chos kyis/ /dbang po so sor nges mdzad pa'i/ /de yi tshig don legs bsams te/ /stong nyid bsgrub la'ang gnas par byos/ /bcom ldan thams cad mngon sum du/ /rtse gcig sems kyis bsam byas na/ /ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang / /

gzungs mchog dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan dpal mgur gsung chos kyis/ /dam pa'i dbyangs des 'khor rnams 'dul/ /ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing / /so sor ci rigs ya mtshan ston/ /de lta'i gsung mchog dam pa la/ /

rtag par bsam zhing 'jigs pa spongs/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ljags mtshan 'di/ /smon lam rgya chen dbang gis brnyes/ /chos rnams med par ston mdzad pa/ /ji ltar mkha' la ma chags bzhin/ /sangs rgyas ljags mtshan gsung sgra la/ /de bsams

smon lam tshad med 'grub/ /gang zhig dbyangs can mngon mchod dam/ /yang na slob mas man ngag bzhin/ /lung bzhin chos de gang sgrub pa/ /bkur sti'i mchog rnams thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig ye shes mchog sgrub pa'ang / /rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di

gzung / /bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'phel zhing / /nges par 'grub la yid gnyis spongs/ /gang zhig nor sgrub nor dang ldan/ /khe dang grags pa'ang de bzhin 'grub/ /'byung bar 'dod pa'ang rnam grol bar/ /nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs/ /

yon tan mang po tshad med pa'ang / /bsam pa bzhin du kun grub pas/ /'di la tshul bzhin gang gnas pa/ /nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs/ /dben par gtsang ma'i gos gyon te/ /dkyil 'khor ci ran byas pa der/ /bum pa rgyas pa bzhi bzhag

ste/ /dus bzhin me tog bdug pas mchod/ /ba dan gdugs dang lda ldi bre/ /phye ma byug pas rgyas par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas dang ni dbyangs can mchod/ /lha de mthong 'dod mthong bar 'gyur/ /dbyangs can lha mo de mdun du/ /zhag bdun gsum du

bzlas brjod de/ /gal te lha de ma mthong na/ /bsam pa brtan pas zhag dgur bzlas/ /de yi nub mo'ang ma mthong na/ /gzhan du shis pa'i gnas btsal te/ /tshul bzhin lha mo'i gzugs bris la/ /mchod cing bzlas brjod rgyun mi gcad/ /

bdag dang gzhan don tshad med la/ /nyin mtshan rgyun tu brtson bskyed de/ /de yi 'bras bu gzhan la stobs/ /de ni bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ste'ang bsam pa ma grub na/ /zla ba gsum dang drug dang dgu/ /yang na brtson pas lor bzlas na/ /

mngon shes drug la sogs pa'ang 'thob/ /de nas bram ze kauN+Di n+yas/ de skad ces bshad pa thos nas dga' ba dang / rangs pa tshad med pa skyes te/ 'khor 'dus pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis/

sems ma g.yeng bar bdag la nyon cig dang / bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten te/ dbyangs can lha mo mchog la bstod pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad de smra bar bgyi'o/ /phyag 'tshal lha mo mthu chen la/ /'jig rten khams

'dir dbang brnyes par/ /sngon gyi drang srong gis bshad pas/ /de phyir bdag gis khyod la bstod/ /dpal ldan thugs ni bde ba dang / /thos 'dzin mdzes ldan grags ldan pa/ /'jig rten 'di skyed yum yang yin/ /rtag tu dpal la brtson chen

spyod/ /g.yul gyi gnas las rtag tu rgyal/ /snying rje bzod la dul bas bskyed/ /gshin rje'i sring mor lus ston cing / /rtag tu dar gos sngon po mnabs/ /mdzes dang mi mdzes kun ston cing / /spyan mig sus mthong dang ba skyed/ /spyod pa tshad med

'jig rten 'das/ /skyabs su su 'ongs rjes su 'dzin/ /bar 'ga' ri dang brag la gnas/ /bar 'ga' phug dang chu bo'i 'gram/ /yang na ljon sdong nags rnams su/ /gnas de dag ni lha mo'i rten/ /ci ltar ri brags mi rnams kyis/ /rma bya'i mdongs las

gdugs byas shing / /rtag tu lha mo de mchod na/ /thams cad dus su 'jig rten skyob/ /stag dang seng ges 'khor byas shing / /bya dang phyugs kyang de la brtan/ /dril chen sgra dag mngon bsgrags pas/ /bin d+hu'i ri la'ang grag par gyur/ /phyag na rtse gsum

thor tshugs dbu/ /yang na nyi zla'i ru mtshon bsnams/ /zla ba mar ngo bcu gcig gam/ /dgu yi dus su mchod pa bya/ /g.yul 'gyed dus su thugs brtse bas/ /'jig rten kun la gzigs pa'i phyir/ /lha mo ba su'i gzugs ston pas/ /lha mo'i mchog ste dpe med pa'o/ /

phyugs rdzi rgan mo'i gzugs ston cing / /lha dag 'thab pa'ang rtag tu rgyal/ /yun ring 'jig rten bde bar gnas/ /bar 'ga' khros shing bar 'ga' zhi/ /bram zer smra zhing chos bzhi dang / /rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags kun la mkhas/ /drang srong lha yi dbang brnyes pas/ /

sa chen 'di dang sa bon byed/ /lha mo 'du ba'i dus su yang / /rgya mtsho lud bzhin nges par 'du/ /gnod sbyin klu la sogs rnams kyis/ /kun gyi gtso byed 'dul bar nus/ /mo rnams kun gyi tshangs spyod mchog /'jig rten gtso sbyin bdag la

dgongs/ /rgyal po'i gnas la'ang pad+mo bzhin/ /chu bo la yang gru dang gzings/ /zla ba nya bzhin zhal yang rgyas/ /mang du thos ldan rten yang byed/ /ri bo'i rtse bzhin spobs pa 'phags/ /bsams pas gling dang rab kyang ston/ /lha min la sogs

lha rnams kyis/ /kun gyis yon tan bstod cing bsngags/ /spyan stong brgya byin lha rgyal yang / /gus pa'i sems kyis zhal du lta/ /sems can gang dag ci 'dod pa/ /de kun bsam pa myur du skong / /blo myur thos pa 'dzin pa yang / /sa chen 'di

gnas kun gyi mchog /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams dag tu/ /rtag tu sgron chen snang byed bzhin/ /bya dang gcan gzan kyi'ang / /kun gyi bsam pa yongs su skong / /bud med kyi mchog ri bo bzhin/ /drang srong 'jig rten ri gnas

bzhin/ /lha mo gzhon bzhin 'dod dang bral/ /mi mjed bdag bzhin bden par smra/ /'jig rten mthun par gzugs ston cing / /'dod khams bar gyi lha gnas su'ang / /khyod ni lha mo'i gtso yin pas/ /de las mchog pa'i sems can med/ /

gal te g.yul dang 'jigs pa'i gnas/ /me yi dong du lhung 'gyur ram/ /chu bo g.yang sa mi rgod las/ /'jigs pa de las sgrol bar mdzad/ /rgyal po'i chad pas bcings pa'am/ /yang na dgra yis bsad par yang / /rtse gcig sems ni ma g.yos na/ /

sdug bsngal dag las thar bar 'gyur/ /dge dang mi dge kun la skyob/ /byams dang brtse bas mdun du gnas/ /de phyir bdag ni sems btud de/ /phyag 'tshal lha mo chen mo la'o/ /de nas yang slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+yas/ lha mo chen mo

dbyangs can la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad nga la nyan par gyis/ /lha dang dri za lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gi rab gang yin/ /

lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod/ /yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag brgyan/ /dbyangs can zhes bya spyan ni yangs shing bsod nams 'bar/ /dri med ye shes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen

sna tshogs tha dad lta bur blta ba'i phyir/ /mchog rab ngag gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do/ /dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang / /yang dag bsngags pa yon tan byed pa dang / /dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang / /mig mchog dang ni mig gi dam pa dang / /dge ba'i

gnas dang dge ba mthong ba dang / /yon tan bsam mi khyab pas brgyan pa dang / /zla ba 'dra dang dri ma med 'od dang / /ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang / /seng ge mchog dang mi la zhon pa dang / /lag pa brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyan pa la/ /mda' gzhu mdung

thung ral gri dgra sta dang / /be con lcags kyi 'khor lo zhags pa bsnams/ /zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba'i zhal/ /yid du 'ong ba'i ngag dang dbyangs snyan dang / /shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang / /dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can dam pa dang / /lha dang

lha min dbang pos mchod pa dang / /lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas brjod dang / /'byung po'i tshogs kyi gnas rtag mchod pa'i phyir/ /swA hA bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o/ /bdag la yon tan khyad par kun stsol cig /dgos pa kun tu bdag la dngos

grub stsol/ /dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu srungs/ /yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni/ /nang par langs nas gtsang mar brjod par bya/ /bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams cad rnyed/ /dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis bram ze kauN+Di n+ya la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ lha mo dbyangs can la bstod pa dang / dngos grub dam pa slong bas bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// //

bam po brgyad pa/ de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+yas bstod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig gis/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la gsol nas/ yang 'khor de dag la smras pa/ skyes bu khyed kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba dang / de'i thugs rjes

bskyab cing / tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / thos pa 'dzin cing shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing / tshig sbyor ba'i rgyan la gsal zhing thogs pa med pa grub par 'dod pas/ bsam pa de

des shing gus pa'i sems kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la sogs

pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par bden pa'i gsung la gnas pa/ so so'i dbang po dang mthun pa/ bden pa ston pa la mi slu bar

gsung ba/ bskal pa bye ba tshad med par yang dag par bden pa'i tshig rtag tu ston cing / gsung ba de dag la rjes su yi rang ngo / /bden pa gsung bas ljags yangs la ring ba bkram ste/ zhal dang 'dzam bu'i gling dang / rgyal chen bzhi dang / stong gcig dang /

stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad sel ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la lus btud de phyag 'tshal

lo/ /ljags kyi mtshan dam pa de 'dra ba dang / spobs pa tshad med pa dang bdag ldan par gyur cig /phyag 'tshal bcom ldan dbyangs can mchog /byang chub chen po dbyangs can mchog /'phags pa rang rgyal dbyangs can mchog /zung

bzhi ya brgyad dbyangs can mchog /bden pa bzhi gsung dbyangs can mchog /yang dag gzigs pa dbyangs can mchog /drang srong tshangs 'khor dbyangs can mchog /lha mo u ma dbyangs can mchog /skem byed lha yang dbyangs can mchog /

gzi can klu yang dbyangs can mchog /mtshan mo lha mo dbyangs can mchog /rgyal chen bzhi po dbyangs can mchog /bde gnas lha sras dbyangs can mchog /rdo rje gsang bdag dbyangs can mchog /khyab 'jug lha yang dbyangs can mchog /lha mo

pe ma dbyangs can mchog /tshogs bdag lha yang dbyangs can mchog /dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can mchog /dpal gyi blo gros dbyangs can mchog /hi ri tshig 'chang dbyangs can mchog /ma mo kun mchog dbyangs can mchog /'phrog ma mo

yang dbyangs can mchog /gnod sbyin kun kyang dbyangs can mchog /phyogs bcu'i rgyal po dbyangs can mchog /bdag la las mchog kun gyis stobs/ /mtha' med dbyangs can mchog thob mdzod/ /slu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par

grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcings pa bcad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden tshig gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul dang bral la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /don dam gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor mang gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs can lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni tshig la thogs med mdzod/ /bdag gi bsam pa ci mchis pa/ /thams cad myur du grub par mdzod/ /nad med rtag tu bde ba

dang / /tshe ring ba yang thob par shog /rig pa'i gnas la mkhas pa dang / /byang chub lam la brtson pa dang / /skye bo kun la phan mang mdzod/ /re ba thams cad myur du skong / /bdag gi yang dag bden tshig dang / /bdag gis mi slu tshig smras pa/ /

dbyangs can lha mo mchog gis ni/ /bdag gi don de grub par mdzod/ /lha mo 'dir ni gshegs par gsol/ /bdag gi tshig la thogs med mdzod/ /lus dang ngag la myur zhugs shing / /yid myur spobs pa rdzogs par mdzod/ /bdag gi lce yi dbang po

la/ /bde gshegs spobs pa ldan par mdzod/ /tshig gi gzi brjid mthu des ni/ /sems can thams cad 'dul bar mdzod/ /bdag gis tshig ni ci smras pa/ /don de thams cad grub par shog /tshig la thams cad gus skyed cing / /byed pa thams cad chud ma

gzon/ /nam zhig bdag gi spobs 'dod pa/ /don de grub par ma gyur na/ /lha mo khyod kyi bden tshig ni/ /thams cad pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mtshams med lnga yi sdig bgyis pa/ /sangs rgyas bkas ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ /gang yang dgra bcom pa dag dang / /

byas pa gzo ba'i tshig rnams dang / /shA ri'i bu dang maud gal dang / /bcom ldan 'khor gyi gtso bo ste/ /de la sogs pa'i bden tshig kyang / /thams cad bdag la grub par shog /sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor rnams dag /bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drang gis/ /

bdag gi re ba bskang ba'i phyir/ /thams cad myur du gshegs par mdzod/ /yang dag bden pa'i tshig gsol ba/ /thams cad slu ba med par shog /srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang / /gtsang ma'i gnas ni thams cad dang / /tshangs pa tshangs chen mdun 'don dang / /

tshangs pa'i rgyal 'khor thams cad dang / /stong gsum 'khor ba'i bar dag dang / /mi mjed 'jig rten gtso bo dang / /de dang de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de kun deng 'dir spyan drangs te/ /thugs rjes bdag la dgongs mdzad cing / /brtse ba kun gyis gzung

bar mdzod/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha dag dang / /gzhan yang 'phrul dga'i lha dag dang / /byams pa mngon par 'tshang rgya'i gnas/ /dga' ldan gnam gyi lha rnams dang / /'thab bral gyi ni lha rnams dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum lha

rnams dang / /rgyal chen bzhi yi lha rnams dang / /gzhan yang lha 'khor thams cad dang / /sa chu me rlung lha dag dang / /ri rab lhun la gnas pa dang / /chu bdun ri bo lha rnams dang / /de kun 'khor dang bcas pa dang / /zur phud lnga can

nor rgyas dang / /nyi zla gza' dang rgyu skar dang / /de la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / /'jig rten bde bar mdzad pa'i gnas/ /de la sogs pa'i lha thams cad/ /sdig pa'i las la ma mos pa/ /sangs rgyas la gus 'byung ba'i ma/ /bu rab

gzhon la byams pa dang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams/ /dri za dang ni lha ma yin/ /gzhan yang mi 'am ci dag dang / /lto 'phye che la sogs pa rnams/ /kun kyang bcom ldan mthu yis ni/ /bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drangs te/ /thugs

rje brtse ba'i dgongs pa yis/ /bdag la thogs med spobs pa skyed/ /lha dang mi rnams thams cad kyis/ /gzhan gyi sems rig mkhyen pa rnams/ /kun gyi mthu yis byin brlabs shing / /bdag la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig /ji snyed nam

mkha'i mthas gtugs shing / /chos kyi dbyings kyi mus klas pa'i/ /sems can de dag thams cad kyis/ /bdag la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig /de nas dbyangs can lha mo la bram ze kauN+Di n+yas de skad ces gsol pa dang / lha mos skyes bu chen po de la

dge'o zhes smras te/ gang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag 'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste/ sems 'dun pas rjes su dmigs

shing / ci 'dod pa'i don cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na/ chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu phra zhing / zab pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa de bsam pa thams cad

myur du 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems g.yeng bas byas pa ni ma gtogs so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / bram ze kauN+Di n+ya rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar ba byas nas rjes su 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can

la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su bsrung zhing / yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang / mdo 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad la chos 'di lta bu bstan pas bde ba dang / bsod nams dang / spobs pa tshad med pa

'phel bar 'gyur te/ gang sems bskyed pa rnams kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byas pa legs so legs so/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ste

lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis ci nas kyang / chos smra ba'i dge slong de yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs

par 'gyur ba dang / brel phongs pa ma mchis pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems brtas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems bde bar gdugs mtshan bas par 'gyur ba dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig dang / yi

ge rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par brjod par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i

dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang /

bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / mu ge ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba

dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /

gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / sman zong dang / yo byad dang / 'tshog chas kyi bye brag gzhan dag gis kyang

dge slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo dpal

gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ des da ltar phyogs gang dang / gang du sems pa dang / phyogs gang dang gang du lta ba dang / phyogs gang dang / gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang / der sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bde bar sbyar

ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ zas dang / skom dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / yo

byad gzhan dag gis kyang mi phongs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag yo byad thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo dpal gyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bya/ spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ lha mo

chen mo dpal gyi ming nas lan gsum brjod cing / de la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog kyang byin la/ ro sna tshogs kyang byin na/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa yi bcud

dag rnam par 'phel/ /lha rnams rtag tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /'bras bu lo thog ldum sdong ljon shing rnams/ /lo thog shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang skyed/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming brjod pa'i sems can de dag la lha

mo chen mo dpal ni sems par 'gyur/ de dag la dpal chen por byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lha mo chen mo la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so legs so/ /lha mo khyod kyis sngon byas pa rjes su dran pas/ de

bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams la phan pa dang / bde bas phan 'dogs shing / mdo sde 'di yang yongs su rgyas par byed pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i

dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas lha mo dpal chen mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di nas byang phyogs su mi ring ba zhig na/ lha'i rgyal po rnam thos

kyi bu'i pho brang lcang lo can gyi 'khor na skyed mos tshal dam pa bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces bya ba na/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pad+ma dam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na bdag gnas te/ mi gang la la 'bru'i phung po spel bar 'dod pa

des rang gi khyim phyag dar legs par bya/ khrus legs par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ gos dri rab tu zhim pa bgo bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi lag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/ me tog

dang / bdug pa dang / spos kyang 'bul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal la yang mchod cing / me tog dang /

bdug pa yang 'bul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yi mthus/ de'i tshe lha mo chen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo

dpal 'gugs par 'dod pa des rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag

'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par 'bar ba rin chen 'od zer snang ba'i rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam

bu gser gyi rgyal mtshan gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser du snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma brgya'i 'od zer snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser ri rin

chen 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen

tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od dam pa

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di dag la sbyor bar bya ste/ /rig sngags 'di bdag la 'byor bar gyur cig /sAd+ya the dan/ pra ti pUr+Na tsa re/ sa man+tA dar+sha Ne/ ma hA bi hA ra ga ti/ sa man ta/ bi mA na ga te/

ma hA kAr+ya/ pra ti prA ba Ni/ sa twA/ ar+tha sa ma tA nu/ pra pU re/ a yA na d+harma tA/ ma hA b+ho gi ni/ ma hA mai tri/ u pa sang hi te/ hi tai Shi/ sang gr-i hI te/ sa mar thA nu pA la ne swA hA/ 'di dag ni spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid kyi

gsang sngags kyi tshig gcig tu de kho na yang dag par grub pa sbyin pa mi slu ba'i don gyi tshig ste/ sems can bar ma la spyod pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dag gis/ lo bdun du 'don cing / 'dzin pa dag yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen

par gnas pa la bsnyen te/ bdag dang sems can kun/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ snga dro dang / phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang /

spos rnams kyis mchod nas/ des bdag gi bsam pa 'di 'byor par gyur cig /myur du 'byor par gyur cig /gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ khyim de shin tu gtsang mar byas la/ lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/

spos dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ stan gtsang ma yang gding bar bya'o/ /sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste bsdad par bya'o/ /de nas skad cig de nyid la/ lha mo chen mo dpal 'ongs nas/ der gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de phyin chad

khyim mam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su nam yang brel cing phongs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /'gron bu dang / gser dang / rin po che dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / yo byad

thams cad 'byor pa dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byed pa de dag thams cad las/ lha mo chen mo dpal la shas kyi mchog sbyin par bya ste/ des na de ci srid 'tsho ba'i bar du de na gnas par

'gyur/ 'phang bar mi 'gyur/ de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis nor yongs su spel ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/

ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor

der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / sa phyogs gang dang gang

na/ dge slong chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri shom par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang gang du chos smra ba stan la mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom

ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma dag sa phyogs de dang de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ /lus mi gda' bar chos kyi khri'i 'og logs su mchis te/ yan lag gi dam pa mgos dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang mthil nas brten par bgyi'o/ /bdag kyang

chos mnyan pa dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ yang dag par rim gror bgyi/ yang dag par mchod par bgyi'o/ /bdag tshim par gyur/ rim gro bgyi ba bgyis par gyur/ rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sa'i phung

po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu brgyad po 'di nas/ sa'i gzhi rdo rje la thug pa'i bar du/ sa'i bcud kyis rnam par 'phel bar bgyi/ yang dag par ni rim gro bgyi/ yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /steng du yang rgya mtsho'i mtha' la thug pa'i sa'i

dkyil 'khor 'di/ sa'i bcud kyi snum gyis brlan par bgyi'o/ /sa chen po 'di rab tu gzi byin dang ldan par bgyi'o/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal sna tshogs rnams gzi byin dang rab tu ldan par

'khrung bar 'gyur/ kun dga' ra ba dang / nags tshal dang / shing ljon pa thams cad dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo thog rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyang / rab tu gzi byin dang ldan par

'gyur ba dang / dri dang rab tu ldan pa dang / snum pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang / ro zhim por 'gyur/ blta na rab tu sdug pa dang / rab tu che bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag kyang btung ba dang / bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag 'tshal

nas/ tshe dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / dbang po rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /gzi byin dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / gzugs dang rab tu ldan par gyur nas kyang / sa la mchis pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs

tha dad pa 'bum phrag du ma dag bgyid par 'gyur/ brtson par 'gyur/ 'bad par 'gyur/ stobs su bgyi ba'i las rnams bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / lo legs pa

dang / rgyas pa dang / nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur/ dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag gzi byin dang / stobs

dang / kha dog dang / gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i slad du/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag chos kyi khri stan la mchis

pa'i gan du mchi bar 'gyur/ mchis nas kyang sems rab tu dang bas sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos smra ba de dag

la gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bshad pa na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ rab tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / rab tu

stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi byin dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa

bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur/ gzi byin dang / /stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / shugs chen po thob par gyur na/ sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag bdun pa'i 'dzam bu'i

gling 'di sa'i bcud chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /sa chen po gzi byin dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la brten pa'i sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur/ rgya chen por yang

'gyur ro/ /sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur nas kyang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod par 'gyur/ bde ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad bza' ba dang / btung ba dang bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs

dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / gnas dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / skyed mos tshal dang / chu bo dang / rdzing dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho dang / lteng ka dang / 'di lta bu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs sa la

gnas pa sa las 'byung ba sa la rten pa 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des sems can de dag thams cad kyis bdag la byas pa gzo bar bgyi'o/ /gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du

bgyis te/ mnyan par bgyi/ bkur stir bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sems can de dag chos smra ba'i gan du mchi ba'i slad du/ rigs tha dad pa dang / khyim

tha dad pa dag nas byung ste mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur la/ thos nas kyang rang rang gi rigs dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/ rang rang gi khyim na gnas pa

dag phan tshun du 'di skad ces bdag cag gis de ring chos mnyan pa zab mo thos so/ /de ring bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ngo / /bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba

khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas so/ /deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar to/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / kyi yul las yongs su thar ro/ /

deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ tshe rabs 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i skye ba yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro zhes gtam zer bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim tha dad pa na gnas par gyur pa de dag sems can gzhan dag la/ gser

'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na dpe gcig tsam brjod dam/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na le'u gcig gam/ sngon byung ba gcig gam/ tha na byang chub sems dpa'i ming ngam/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i mtshan gcig gam/ tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig gcig cig sems can gzhan dag la thos par bgyid dam/ tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu ston tam/ btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na sems can rnam pa tha dad pa de dag phyogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshigs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta bu 'di dag gcig la gcig brjod dam/ thos par bgyid dam/ gtam rgyud brjod na/ btsun pa

bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs de dag thams cad shin tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / shin tu snum par 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs de dang de dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyi phyir/ sa'i bcud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / yo byad thams cad rgyas par skye bar

'gyur/ rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /nor che ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyur ro/ /

de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig nyan na/ de dag mi'i 'jig

rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i ris kyi nang du lha'i ris gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dag la mchod pa'i phyir/ gnas de dag legs

par brgyan par byed dam/ tha na gdugs gcig gam/ ba dan gcig gam/ ras bcos bu gcig gis g.yogs na/ sa'i lha mo rtag tu brgyan pa'i gnas de dag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bdun po de dag tu lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal

med khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe sems can de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skye ba de'i tshe/ sa'i lha mo rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal

med khang re rer yang lan bdun bdun du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol

to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das des na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag dge slong chos smra ba/ chos kyi khri stan la mchis pa de'i tshe chos kyi stan gyi 'og logs kyi sa phyogs de dang de dag tu gnas par bgyi'o/ /ci nas kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag

la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
